code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import PlannerForm from"./components/PlannerForm";import PlannerTable from"./components/PlannerTable";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[plans,setPlans]=useState([]);const fetchPlans=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/plans");setPlans(res.data);};useEffect(()=>{fetchPlans();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"AI Smart Study Planner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlannerForm,{refresh:fetchPlans}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlannerTable,{plans:plans})]});}export default App;
